body:
This is a repeat of issue #20206... easy fix. cce is a respin (I'm assuming) of aocc (makes sense as Shasta is AMD centric)

Same fix as 20206

var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/gdbm/package.py

Add:

patch('gdbm.patch', when='%cce@11:')

Chris Young
title: Installation issue: gdbm doesn't build on Cray Shasta with cce@11.
